data.event: On April 1, 2005, Heda was merged into the expanded city of Numazu.

event.title: December 23, 1854, Diana, the flagship of the Russian fleet bearing Admiral Yevfimy Putyatin and his delegation for the negotiation of the Treaty of Shimoda was struck

data.event: On December 23, 1854, Diana, the flagship of the Russian fleet bearing Admiral Yevfimy Putyatin and his delegation for the negotiation of the Treaty of Shimoda was struck by a tsunami from the Ansei T≈çkai earthquake and sank.

event.title: April 1, 1889 cadastral reform of Meiji period Japan, Heda was organized

data.event: In the April 1, 1889 cadastral reform of Meiji period Japan, Heda was organized as Heda Village.
